thread.title: Here's Karlie Kloss' Favorite Destiny's Child Song, as Performed By The Voice Coaches
thread.title_full: Here's Karlie Kloss' Favorite Destiny's Child Song, as Performed By The Voice Coaches

author: Clover Hope
title: Here's Karlie Kloss' Favorite Destiny's Child Song, as Performed By The Voice Coaches
text:
Vibes. Advertisement 
Here’s a thing that’s interesting in a way many things in life aren’t: the coaches of The Voice— aka your aunts and uncles who used to really boogie with the band back in the day — finding a way to ruin TLC’s “Waterfalls” by turning into an emo acoustic blend of country, R&B, Gwen Stefani raps and Blake Shelton yelps. 
It’s certainly something, if anything. And there’s even a grainy filter to give the performance a real vintage edge. Karlie Kloss approves , even if no one else does, seeing as how “Waterfalls” is her favorite Destiny’s Child song . 
The best parts of this cover, in no particular order: 
Blake Shelton: “Yeaw!” 
Alicia Keys: “Oh, here go my part.” 
Blake Shelton: “Yoo!” 
Adam Levine: “That’s how you sing, America.” 
TFW you locate the rhythm...kinda!: GIF
